name: Ball Paint
description:
Ball Paint is a new addictive 3D game, featuring tons of levels, zen gameplay, and hypnotic colors!

How to play:
-Swipe the screen to adjust your aim angle;
-Launch the colored ball on the figure to paint it;
-Try to paint it all in one color!

Features:
-Infinite levels, with new colors and geometric figures;
-Satisfaying and zen gameplay;
-Easy to pick up;
